The currencies central banks hold as foreign exchange reserves have remained largely steady over decades. How can we #BuildForwardBetter? During our 2020 #IMFmeetings, @KGeorgieva made 3 recommendations to policymakers:
1️⃣ Improve health systems
2️⃣ Avoid withdrawing stimulus support prematurely
3️⃣ Orient stimulus towards transformation of the economy
